profile_summary:

I possess hands-on experience with **Linux** systems and am skilled at deploying and managing **Kubernetes** environments, as well as utilizing **Grafana** and **Prometheus** for monitoring and performance optimization. My background in high-performance computing (HPC) ensures I optimize system architectures for efficiency and scalability.
Additionally, I am adept at documenting processes and collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams to solve complex problems. I thrive in flexible environments and leverage my solid foundation in cloud technologies, including **AWS** and **Azure**, to enhance operational efficiency. My expertise also extends to developing robust solutions that integrate emerging technologies, ensuring compliance with industry standards.
